DOC.brief_summary: Rotator cuff tendinopathy ( RCT ) frequent cause shoulder pain . RCT frequently term impingement syndrome , base underlie mechanism subacromial space soft tissue ( subacromial bursa , rotator cuff tendon long head biceps tendon ) get encroach coracoacromial arch arm elevate . RCT contribute decrease quality life function , induce work incapacity sleep disorder . Exercises , conservative management , show effective increase function decrease pain related RCT . However , lack study compare different type exercise ( i.e . concentric , eccentric , scapular strengthening , proprioceptive , coactivation ) report many systematic review . One type exercise , coactivation strengthening , could efficient . Coactivation strengthen implies recruitment pectoralis major latissimus dorsi perform regular strengthening . When thesis muscle recruit , medio-inferior orientation tendon create force vector limit superior translation humeral head , thus limit subacromial narrowing . The aim study evaluate efficacy coactivation strengthen exercise patient RCT compare regular strengthening exercise . Forty-two participant diagnose RCT orthopaedic surgeon follow standardize protocol randomise either coactivation regular strengthening exercise . Participants perform 6-week exercise protocol . Outcomes measure baseline , three , six , 12 , 18 24 week . The primary outcome function assess Disabilities arm , shoulder Hand ( DASH ) questionnaire . Secondary outcome focus pain ( visual analog scale ) , quality life ( Western Ontario Rotator Cuff Index ) , impression change ( Patient Global Impression Change ) , subacromial distance ( ultrasonography ) muscular strength ( manual dynamometer ) . Investigators expect coactivation strengthen exercise efficient short long term . This trial provide data guide clinician treatment RCT reduce recovery time bring patient back quickly possible work usual function .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Muscle Coactivation Strengthening Rotator Cuff Tendinopathy
DOC.criteria: 1865 year old Experienced shoulder pain > four week Positive Painful Arc Test Positive Neer Hawkins Kennedy test Pain resist isometric movement abduction external rotation Any shoulder pathology Rotator cuff complete tear History shoulder surgery Any systemic inflammation neurological condition Received corticosteroid injection < six week Any known cognitive condition
